sentences.en: Abundant precipitation, dry clear, are unevenly distributed.
sentences.cn: 降水充沛, 干湿分明, 分布不均.

sentences.en: Although such information leaks out, it does so selectively and unevenly.
sentences.cn: 虽然这些信息会泄露出来, 但通常是有选择性和倾向性的.

sentences.en: An unevenly worn tread indicates an alignment or tire inflation problem.
sentences.cn: 轮胎磨损不均表明车轮定位或轮胎充气有问题.

sentences.en: Fuel resources are very unevenly distributed.
sentences.cn: 燃料资源分布很不均匀.

sentences.en: His heart skipping unevenly, his face mournful , Mr. Lin was unable to speak for some time.
sentences.cn: 林先生的眼光跟着寿生的嘴也向那边瞥了一下, 心里直是乱跳,哭丧着脸, 好半天说不出话来.

sentences.en: My cuticles were split and ragged, and my nails unevenly bitten.
sentences.cn: 我指甲根部的表皮龟裂粗糙，指甲被咬得参差不齐。

sentences.en: Plaid fabrics are printed or woven and are designed evenly or unevenly.
sentences.cn: 格子布图案可以印染或机织,图案的设计也可以是均匀的或不均匀的.

sentences.en: Quasars or dwarf galaxies would scatter the elements more unevenly.
sentences.cn: 类星体或矮星系可使这些元素散布得更不平均.

sentences.en: The impeller of the sea water pump is unevenly worn out.
sentences.cn: 海水泵叶轮严重单边磨损.

sentences.en: The labelling substance is unevenly distributed throught the crown of the marked trees.
sentences.cn: 标记物质不能均匀地分布于标记树的整个树冠上.

sentences.en: The results show that rarer variants are distributed more unevenly among populations.
sentences.cn: 本研究结果显示:越罕见的变体,其在人群中的分布也越不均衡.

sentences.en: Third, plenty of rainfall, wet and dry clear, are unevenly distributed.
sentences.cn: 三是降水充沛, 干湿分明, 分布不均.

sentences.en: Winds are generated by the sun as it unevenly heats the earth's surface.
sentences.cn: 当地球表面在阳光的照射下受热不均时就产生了风。

words.tran_cn: 不均匀的；不平坦的；[数] 奇数的
不均衡地；不平坦地；不平行地

trans.tran_cn: 不规则地，不稳定地，不平行地，参差不齐地
